item.title: Putin Tries to Put Positive Spin on Russian Setback in Syria
item.description: The Russian president said that he had not yet met with Bashar al-Assad, the ousted Syrian leader who fled to Moscow, but that he planned to.

item.title: A Timeline of Dominique Pelicot’s Rape Trial in France
item.description: Dominique Pelicot received a 20-year sentence after he admitted to drugging and raping his wife, Gisèle. Here’s how the events unfolded.
